display.title: Tier 1 Rocket
display.description:
Get into space! Use biodiesel from Immersive Engineering or biodisel/diesel from Pneumatic Craft as rocket fuel.

The Tier 1 Rocket is the first rocket the player can craft, and the only one that can be built without resources from other planets.

The Tier 1 Rocket is used travel to the Moon and back to Earth. It can also go to space stations in orbit of the Moon provided a space station has been constructed.
